fields_of_interest: Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: We focus on setting the research agenda for Horizon 2020, Horizon Europe. Furthermore, we are involved in the development of Sustainable shipping initiatives.
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions

goals__remit: MARIN is a hydrodynamic research institute that focuses on improving ships and shipping: zero-emission, safety, autonomy. Furthermore, we work on Blue Growth: renewable energy from the oceans, sustainable development at sea.
